title: Simon Cowell replacing Stern on NBC's 'America's Got Talent'
text: > Entertainment Simon Cowell replacing Stern on NBC's 'America's Got Talent' FILE - In this Feb. 24, 2015 file photo, Simon Cowell poses for photographers at the Elle Style Awards in London. NBC announced Thursday, Oct. 22, that Cowell will appear on the next season of "America's Got Talent," replacing Howard Stern. The show has remained one of summertimeâ€™s most popular programs even as ratings for other reality shows have faded. (Photo by Joel Ryan/Invision/AP, File)
